papers.title: Stripping and modulating of ion beam in plasma
authors: Plasma could be used as a stripper as well as a modulator. Here we would mainly report recent activities in the experiments and simulations on ion beam plasma interaction in low-medium energy ranges. The experiments were carried out at HIRFL at IMP-Lanzhou for ~100keV/u ion beams with gas discharge plasma
and at UNILAC at GSI-Darmstadt for ~10MeV/u ion beam with theta pinch plasma. Charge state evolution
and transportation of ion in plasma were observed. It is shown that
plasma could be an perfect stripper for low-medium energy ion beam
as well an excellent modulator to fucus
compress and even pulslize an intense ion beam.
